means: （现代建筑物开阔的）中庭，天井

word_mean: 〔复atria〕房，前房：解剖学名词，表示供另一组织或器官做入口的小房，常单用以表示心房

sentence.Network_en: He has found that smoke and toxic gases can be transported swiftly up through the atrium.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发现烟和毒害性气体可通过中庭迅速向上传播.

sentence.Network_en: From the left atrium the blood passes through the bicuspid valve into the right ventricle.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自左心房的血液通过二尖瓣进入右心室.

sentence.Network_en: Left ventricular failure results in distention of the left atrium, engorgement of the pulmonary veins.
sentence.Network_cn: 左心室衰竭导致左心房扩张, 肺静脉充盈.

list.abs: 膨大,一般称为储精囊(seminal vesicle),两储精囊汇入多肌肉的阴茎(penis),在阴茎基部有很多单细胞腺体称前列腺(prostate glands),开口于生殖腔(genital atrium)。.

【摘要】:正共同心房(common atrium)又称单心房(single atrium)或三腔两室心(cor trilo-culare biventriculare),是一少见的先天性心脏畸形。本病解剖特点是整个.

entry.def: An atrium is a part of a building such as a hotel or shopping centre, which extends up through several floors of the building and often has a glass roof.

means.word_mean: 1. any chamber that is connected to other chambers or passageways (especially one of the two upper chambers of the heart)
2. the central area in a building; open to the sky
